EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Scale Out Big Data_Q414.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed: Scale Out Your Big Data Apps Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar Scale out your Big Data Apps: The Latest on Pivotal GemFire and GemFire XD on Wednesday, November 12, 2014. Please see event details below:
Date: Wednesday, November 12, 2014 Time: 10AM PST/6PM GMT
Event Number: 661 301 071 Join the Webex <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=661301071> Teleconferencing Information: This webinar will be streaming live, however dial-in options are available:
- US TOLL FREE: 1-855-749-4750 - Global call-in numbers <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=33226853&tollFree=1> - Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> - Access code: 661 301 071
{{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}}
We look forward to you joining us! The Pivotal Team
